doctor.name: Dr. Adnan Kaiser
doctor.info: Dr. Adnan Kaiser is a Plastic Surgeon in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS (DMC), MS (Plastic Surgery). He is a Assistant Professor, Burn & Plastic Surgery at Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Nexus Hospital, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Dr. Adnan Kaiser at Nexus Hospital, Mymensingh is Unknown. Please call to know visiting hour.

doctor.name: Dr. Sultana Razia
doctor.info: Dr. Sultana Razia is a Plastic Surgeon in Mymensingh. Her qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MS (Plastic Surgery). She is a Consultant, Burn & Plastic Surgery at Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Sodesh Hospital, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Dr. Sultana Razia at Sodesh Hospital, Mymensingh is 5pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).
